movies.title: Zero Dark Thirty
movies.plot: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L. Team 6 in May, 2011.

movies.title: Detroit
movies.plot: A police raid in Detroit in 1967 results in one of the largest citizens' uprisings in the history of the United States.

events.title: the 12th Street Riot begins in the early hours of the morning
the Detroit police kill three civilians
